headline: Opportunities and Competition in the $1.19 Billion U.S. IV Bags Market, 2025-2033, Featuring Baxter International, Kraton, Technoflex, B. Braun Medical, Sippex IV Bags and More
summary: Non-PVC, environmentally friendly IV bags are gaining traction due to regulatory and health trends U.S. IV Bags Market U.S. IV Bags Market Dublin, Dec. 29, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- The "United States IV Bags Market Report by Material Type, Capacity, Chamber Type, States and Company Analysis, 2025-2033" has been added to ResearchAndMarkets.com's offering.The United States IV Bags Market is expected to grow substantially, increasing from US$ 595.98 million in 2024 to US$ 1.19 billion in 2033.
